column5: any local fishing stores sell these babies? i want to get one for my c4
EBAY, lol thats where i found em anyway
Just got one for my C4, came from Rollie&Helens, not in Ontario though...  www.muskyshop.com
Aikmans has them, not sure if he ships or not, they are located near Dundas and Hurontario in Mr and Mississauga.
thanks guys, i ended up ordering a tonne of stuff from bass pro and rollie and helens  can't wait til the season opens
